Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 240th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2003...
Injured on 4/7/2003 with a Sprained Wrist, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Kansas City to Tampa Bay on 7/18/2008 (Going to TB: RF E. Wilke. Going to KCA: CF J. Gerut)...
Had first career hit on 9/15/2010, off Bill Toon (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/4/2010, off Dan Wheeler (KCA)...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/7/2017...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 4/9/2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 8/23/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/15/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,750,000 per year...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 6/15/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/19/2021, hitting .429 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/26/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
